mapper.select: SELECT p.permission_name from tb_user u JOIN tb_role r on JSON_CONTAINS(u.role,CAST(r.id AS CHAR)) JOIN tb_permission p on JSON_CONTAINS(r.permissions, CAST(p.id AS CHAR )) WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1;
